allow:
Bash(echo "

**Summary - Logging Investigation**

The logging system works as follows:
1. Only ERROR and WARN logs are saved to database (INFO/DEBUG are memory-only)
2. Logs are batched and flushed every $BATCH_TIMEOUTms or when $BATCH_SIZE logs accumulate
3. The user_id is set via loggingStore.setUserId() in the user store
4. Logs are sent to database via CREATE_LOG GraphQL mutation

To see logs in the /en/logs page:
1. Navigate to http://localhost:5174/en/logs
2. You should see any ERROR or WARN level logs
3. INFO and DEBUG logs will NOT appear (only in browser console)

To test logging is working:
1. Check browser console for logging output (enabled in development)
2. Trigger an actual error in the app
3. Go to /en/logs and check if the error appears

Let me check if there are any errors being logged in the console...")
